channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: All street lights out, 3rd February
item.description:
The street lights are out along the whole of Elmfield Road, Elmfield Avenue and Midwinter Avenue. There are elderly people who walk their dogs in the evening and itâ€™s pitch black along the street.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 8 Elmfield Avenue, Cheltenham

item.title: Lots of potholes, 3rd February
item.description:
Lots of pot holes at the end of vertican Road just before barton close in innsworth. There is also a quite large 1 at the entrance of vertican Road but I didn't get a photo of that one

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 7 Barton Close, Innsworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red light sequence, 3rd February
item.description:
When leaving from work at roughly 11.30 the lights used to be when coming from A417 to turn right down the A40 the lights used to be part time but they sequence has changed and the lights nearest to Barnett way are red even though no one is there its just a hindrance can someone look at putting them back to how they were before please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 4 Barnett Way, Barnwood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Silver Vauxhall Astra, 3rd February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 42 Andover Road, Cheltenham
